events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it promptly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will reach out soon with next steps.
We completed an initial screening and are impressed with your technical background and experience.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The interviewers noted strong problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 14th to discuss culture fit and company values.
The HR interview went well, and they appreciated your communication skills and alignment with company culture.
We are pleased to extend an offer for the Software Engineer position including a competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We look forward to having you on our team.
You have officially accepted the offer. Welcome aboard! We are excited to start this journey together.
Your onboarding process has begun, including access to systems and introductions to your new team.
The hiring process is officially closed and we are thrilled to officially welcome you as our new Software Engineer.
